#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	int t,n,wins[50],i,j,ties,max;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	for(i=0;i<t;i++)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		for(j=0;j<n;j++)	scanf("%d",&wins[j]);
		max=0;
		for(j=0;j<n;j++)
		{
			scanf("%d",&ties);
			if((wins[j]*3+ties)>=max)
				max=wins[j]*3+ties;	
		}
		printf("\n%d",max);
	}
	return 0;
}
